DOC.detailed_description: This PI-initiated , randomize , unblinded , clinical trial technology-based 3 month lifestyle intervention vs. usual care among men low risk prostate cancer . We recruit consent 76 men prostate cancer UCSF . The subject ask complete questionnaire , 7 day accelerometer measurement , body measurement ( weight , waist , hip , pulse , blood pressure ) collection blood specimen baseline 3 month . Subjects randomize two arm ( Intervention Group Control Group ) . The Intervention Group ( N=38 ) access lifestyle website activity monitor ( e.g. , Fitbit ) , receive text message , provide individualized lifestyle recommendation . The Control Group ( N=38 ) standard care ask continue usual lifestyle habit . They receive access lifestyle website provide individualized lifestyle recommendation 3 month .
